Unable to create symlink to NTFS volume whereas it works with mklink.exe

TFS:14549088

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
# if the WindowsPSModulePath is not already installed
install-module WindowsPSModulePath

Add-WindowsPSModulePath

$v=Get-Volume -DriveLetter c
# $v.Path will look like \\?\Volume{bf8e0388-f14a-4768-94fe-46323c5f4835}\                                                                      
New-Item -Type SymbolicLink -path c:\d1 -Value $v.Path
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
Works like mklink.exe
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
At line:1 char:1
+ New-Item -Type SymbolicLink -path c:\d1 -Value $v.Path
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidArgument: (:) [New-Item], PSArgumentNullException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : ArgumentNull,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.NewItemCommand     
```

title: Cannot create symlinks to NTFS volumes
